name: build-game
description: Build the Drill Game binary with optional run. Creates optimized binary in the project root.

optimize.description: Build with optimizations (smaller binary, no debug info)

commands.command:
#!/bin/bash
set -e
cd /home/kishlin/Workspace/2D-Drill

echo "üî® Building Drill Game..."
echo ""

if [ "{{optimize}}" = "true" ]; then
  echo "Building optimized binary (no debug info)..."
  go build -ldflags="-s -w" -o drill-game ./cmd/game
else
  echo "Building with debug info..."
  go build -o drill-game ./cmd/game
fi

if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  SIZE=$(ls -lh drill-game | awk '{print $5}')
  echo ""
  echo "‚úÖ Build successful! Binary: drill-game ($SIZE)"
  
  if [ "{{run}}" = "true" ]; then
    echo ""
    echo "üéÆ Starting game..."
    echo ""
    ./drill-game
  fi
else
  echo "‚ùå Build failed"
  exit 1
fi
